Key Match Events: Chimwemwe Idana scored an own goal in the 22nd minute
Chawanangwa Kaonga scored a goal for Malawi in the 31st minute
Jean Claude Girumugisha scored a goal for Burundi in the 24th minute
Lanjesi Nkhoma scored a goal for Malawi in the second half
Mokono Elie Eldhino scored a goal for Burundi in the 87th minute
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game was played at the Bingu National Stadium in Malawi
Others: With this win, Burundi is currently at the top of Group L
Malawi will travel to Bamako, Mali for their second Group L match against Burkina Faso next week
Malawi will face Senegal back-to-back in October
Burundi will host Senegal at BNS
